need staff? get started!

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_fullwidth_slider][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_end=”#f4f8fb” background_color_gradient_start_position=”29%” background_color_gradient_end_position=”81%”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.1″ width=”49%” width_tablet=”74%” width_phone=”61%” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” max_width_tablet=”” max_width_phone=”2560%” max_width_last_edited=”on|phone”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center”]

Award-winning life science staffing company serving the East Coast from our hub offices in Massachusetts, New York, New Jersey, New Hampshire, Maryland, North Carolina and Pennsylvania.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|||on|||||” text_orientation=”center” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”1.6em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Have a life science staffing need? Call us today 508.907.6222
